channel.title: Need help With Changing item prices to exactly that price
channel.description:
Ok i know how to change shop prices with item.cfg but when i change them it seems theres a multiplier? so like if i made a dragon token worth 1m it would be like 1,563,975 or something So if anyone knows how to get rid of the multiplier post here please
Btw i use Devolution V7 :)

item.title: Need help With Changing item prices to exactly that price
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

Darkness Pk:

You compile? Without errors?

you dont need to compile when you edit a .cfg file…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help With Changing item prices to exactly that price

item.title: Need help With Changing item prices to exactly that price
item.dc:creator: @Jelly-Fish Jelly-Fish
item.description:
@Jelly-Fish wrote:

This Is Very Easy…
Go to item.cfg
Example:

item = 15333	Armadyl_Godsword	A_beautiful,_heavy_sword.	30000	50000000	30000	0	132	80	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	132	8

That 50000000 is price.

Read full topic
